name: SteamRush (itch)
description:
A game by ForkyTheEditor, Tralius, Huskyez, StormLaw with special thanks to DragoSin and ReturnToTheLobby

Art by EliBurning and SpeedX.

Music composed by Junkyard512.

Each of the above mentioned people have helped with the game design and coming up with ideas.

The main character, Larry, decided to enact his revenge on his corrupted uncle, Harry, for having killed his beloved Jenny. The uncle was expecting this and trapped the protagonist in the seemingly endless headquarters of his mining corporation.

Join aboard Larry’s quest for revenge and kill the soulless remains of Harry’s steam powered robotic workers.

Thank you for checking out our game and we hope you will enjoy it.
